block_comment: The provided Verilog block is responsible for writing data into the physical layer when two conditions are met: the complex clock delay calibration is not finished and the physical data storage is not full. Specifically, it accomplishes this by checking if "complex_oclkdelay_calib_done" is false and "phy_data_full" is not true, and if both are the case, assigns prbs_o (a generated test pattern) to "phy_wrdata" as long as these conditions are satisfied. The time constant TCQ is used to define the delay for the assignment. This block is part of a larger code block entitled "wrdq_div1_2to1_wrcal_first".
